other

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • other.Timer

  • public class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
    The timer is used as a clock for resolving delta every game loop and moving objects relative to delta and their speed

      static float Delta()
      Returns the delta to move everything pre: none post: If the game var isPaused is not true then the Delta is returned Otherwise delta is returned

      Calculates the difference in time pre: none.
      static long GrabTime()
      The current time since the game started is calculated
      static float grabTimeMultiplier()

      static void setGameFastforward()
      Sets the timeMultiplier pre: none post: if the time multiplier is 1 then it is set to 3 and visa versa
      static void setGamePaused()
      Sets the game to a paused or un paused state pre: none post: paused is set to true if is false or vice versa
      static void setGamePaused(boolean gamePaused)
